Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Ewing
ShortDescription: 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via 106th, Muskegon, Commercial, 100th, Ewing & 106th due to, street blockage near 103rd/Ewing.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 106th, Muskegon, Commercial, 100th, Ewing and 106th due to, street blockage near 103rd/Ewing.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Long
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Central, Augusta, Laramie and Division due to, street blockage near Division/Long.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Central, Augusta, Laramie and Division due to, street blockage near Division/Long.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line Line trains are running with delays at Garfield due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line Line trains are running with delays at Garfield due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
